title: Apple leads the headphone market in the US with AirPods and Beats
content:
AirPods have become a huge success since they were introduced in 2016, and Apple has already expanded its lineup of wireless headphones â€“ which also includes Beats products. According to a Statista survey, Apple leads the headphone market in the United States “by a considerable distance” thanks to AirPods and Beats.

more…

description: According to a Statista research, Apple leads the headphone market in the US "by a considerable distance" thanks to AirPods and Beats.
